review_title: Seriously Injured in a Car Accident
review:
I had never been in a serious car accident before in my life, and when it finally happened I really wasn't sure what to do. I knew that, because I had sustained an injury, I needed a lawyer so I began a search. I made an appointment with an associate of Aaron Example and decided, during that very first meeting, I was going to choose him. He was absolutely wonderful and worked with me very closely. He checked in on me before and after my surgery, purely because he cared.

If you are in need of a lawyer, Aaron Example is by far your best choice.
